general_info.summary: This document outlines various aspects of Sharda University, including its academic programs and schools (Dental Sciences, Medical Sciences & Research, Nursing Science & Research), administrative reports (Examination Annual Report, Academic Bank of Credits), student-focused initiatives (Curricula Feedback, University Brochure, Global Knowledge Seekers, Our Recruiters, Career Counseling, Skill Enhancement), and university governance (Leadership, History, Statutory Bodies, Tenders, Act, Statutes and Ordinances). It also details specific services and activities like Banking and Postal Services, COVID-19 information, Family & Couple Counselling, Language and Communication Skills, Soft Skills, Technology Trends awareness, Entrepreneurship, FM Radio, a Mentoring Portal, and information on international campuses and special courses.

career_path.summary: This text outlines the diverse career paths available after completing a course in Periodontology and Oral Implantology. Graduates can pursue academic careers in dental institutes, work as consultant periodontists in hospitals and clinics, or establish their own private practice.  Further opportunities include government positions in health departments, research roles with organizations like ICMR, employment in public sector undertakings and the Indian Army, international relocation after equivalent examinations, specialization in oral implantology, and the pursuit of a Ph.D.
career_path.raw_content:
Career path you can choose after the course
• Can work as an Academician with provision of teaching Jobs in various dental Institutes across India in the department of Periodontology and Oral Implantology.
• Opportunity to work as a Consultant Periodontist at Dental Hospitals and other Dental Clinics for specialized Perio cases.
• To become an entrepreneur to establish a clinic. Government jobs in department of health and family welfare and to carry out research work.
• Jobs in public sector undertaking (PSU) and Jobs in Indian Army Corps.
• Opportunity to relocate in Foreign Countries after passing equivalent examination
• Opportunity to practice specialized Oral Implantology.
• To be able to persue Ph.D conduct various research acitivities in collaborations with organizations like ICMR.
